root.str: Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the Alpha Squad pattern to your weapon.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 50%.
Absorb lightning strikes with a Lightning Arrester
NC6S Gauss SAW S: Copper Medal
Earn spawn experience from your Lodestar Prototype in a contested area
Single Use Sandy Scrub Weapon Camo
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 3.57% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
The Infiltrator is a sniper class with a cloaking ability, spotting tools, and the ability to hack enemy terminals.
Revives fallen allies around the Combat Medic.
Apply the single use India Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Anyway, they located some data breaches and want us to play janitor. I kind of feel like there's more to it than that, but better off not asking questions.
<font color="#5CA8DD">Synthium</font> is an uncommon resource type. These are typically earned when your Outfit owns a Facility or Construction-Enabled Lattice Base.

What's left of the northeastern Warpgate could be described as a mess of floating rocks and energy pouring into the sky. In the wake of its devastation, two outposts witnessed the events before the collapse. If there is any data yet to be recovered from these ruins, it would highly sought after, and only by Nanite Systems.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Prowler by 270 seconds.
To change classes, interact with an equipment terminal, then select the class you'd like to use on the left side of the menu. To equip that class click the equip button.
Good, good. Our scientists should have plenty of info to sort through... if only we had the place to ourselves.
Increases the Nano-Regen Device's recharge rate by 17%.
Further increases the efficiency of the MAX's JS236 capacitor allowing it to recharge at a faster rate.
Bullets will now pierce through one infantry target before stopping, but reduces rate of fire by 10%.
Allows cortium to be used to construct an Aspis Anti-Aircraft Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players. TR only.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 3.33% every 1 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Waypoints are personal markers that can be set on your map. Squad leaders can also set a squad waypoint that all squad members can see.
Apply the Petal camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Mosquito by 120 seconds.
The following skills will be refunded:
We've made the list and checked it twice. Each day in December features a special item!
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 75%.
Increases outfit resource countributions for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Magrider. VS use only.
The smart-choke tightens pellet spread when firing while aimed by 0.5, but decreases spread when firing from hip by 0.5.

The Nemesis Evaluation Seeking and Tracking system in these micro-missiles are fired in bursts and after traveling several meters can divert course mid-flight to home in on medium or larger sized vehicles they fly nearby. The payload in these projectiles are suited for general purpose anti-vehicle combat. NSO use only.
The EW Mark I-Q Rapid Laser is a variant of the Mark I Rapid Laser modified to fit a Flash. It is well suited at taking out enemy personnel but lacks the power needed to penetrate heavy armor.
Certifications related to all hand grenades
Customize your Harasser with armor plating. NC use only.
Increases the time it takes for the turret to overheat during sustained fire to 11 seconds
Allows the Engineer to use the Proximity mine
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Rank 100 Hood Ornament. VS use only.
Contains a NC15 Phoenix plus 1000 Certs
Permission to lose this fight is denied!
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 20%.
This encrypted data drive contains misleading intelligence that is intended to cause extreme damage to the enemy's war effort. The exact nature of this intelligence is unknown.
The vehicle pad is where enemy vehicles appear

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Increases hold breath duration by 50%.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 84 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley</font> All we've gotta do is slow down the enemy so they can't their research done. That means an Infiltration mission for you. Take this virus and inject it into enemy Biolab consoles.
I.R.I.S. wants to start spreading computer viruses to key facilities, and they're looking for more hands to help them get that done.

A coalition of separatists determined to remain free of the controlling and oppressive ideologies of other empires. They fight for personal freedom and liberty for all.

"Liberty or Death!"

Cloak does not drain while stationary, but prevents use of primary weapons while equipped. While moving, cloak lasts up to 12 seconds. When drained, recharges to full in 14 seconds while cloaked and stationary, or in 10 seconds while uncloaked.
Capture and hold all 3 Amp Stations on Amerish

The ANT is a harvesting vehicle, capable of using mining lasers to draw resources from Cortium nodes throughout the world. When deployed, an access terminal located in the rear of the vehicle will allow you to construct objects using the refined Cortium within.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.

Is such a thing even possible? Yes it is.

The Lightyear VX2's overcharged plasma generator is capable of eliminating distant targets rapidly.

Reduces damage taken from flak by 30%, and small arms and ESF nose guns by 10%.

A single-shot grenade launcher that can be attached under the barrel of the rifle. The added weight increases the equip time of the attached weapon.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 missiles.

Nanite Systems' Annihilator was the first rocket launcher to integrate both air and ground-based lockon capabilities, at cost to its dumbfire capabilities. This variant of the weapon sports a classy gold plating. All factions can use NS weapons. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Required Lockon: Aircraft or Armor</font>
Tool: Rocket Launcher: Lancer VS22 AE
Purchase the Storm Armor from Representative Ayla
The NS Deep Freeze is an experimental pistol that is capable of condensing and freezing atmospheric moisture then firing it as a projectile.
Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Enlightened one, the soldiers of the Vanu Sovereignty have proven instrumental in quelling the storms of Esamir and repairing the damage wrought in the aftermath of the warpgate's destruction.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> I will never get used to that drop. Regardless, it's time to find where that keycard is used. Logic dictates that it will be somewhere in that facility.
Increases magazine size by 5 rounds by streamlining the ammunition placement and feeding, and slows your reload speed by 0.300 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, welcome to the Containment Site. Start by walking through the new facility. We need to know how bad things are before we get started.
Turning this on enables the ability to toggle sprint with each key press. (Default: Off)
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Vanu Sovereignty has taken Dahaka!

Initiate, we will monitor your progress from a distance. Help your brothers and sisters enact Vanu's will by capturing enemy installations and defending our own. As your contributions increase, so will your Battle Rank.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Hey slick, glad you're interested in the gig. Head to Esamir, I'll contact you once you've arrived.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Pistol Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.
A deceptive looking land mine that, upon detecting nearby enemy infantry, explodes into a cloud of anti-infantry shrapnel.
you moved too far from the vehicle terminal
Reduces damage taken from small arms, and heavy machine guns, gatling guns, aircraft noseguns, and anti-aircraft machineguns by 20%.
Single Use Amerish Brush Armor Camo
With an extended barrel and integrated scope the NS-44L Blackhand provides significant advantages over similar pistols when engaging threats at longer ranges.
Although war has become no less brutal since the era of this helmet's namesake, it has become decidedly less messy. NC use only.
Big brother to the CB-100, the 200 model was designed to emphasize stopping power and accuracy at cost to its rate of fire. NSO use only.
The CQC-25 remains the carbine of choice for close combat situations, allowing for surprisingly accurate hip fire.
An energy efficient power core interface allows the Sirius SX12 to take out multiple targets before needing to reload. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
Available as part of the Fourth Anniversary Bundle, this decal can be applied to armor and is unique to each faction.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> What? Don't let my calm, collected, and incredibly handsome demeanor fool you. I am a student of the many arts and mysteries of the universe.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Based on previous investigations, we have plotted out the best locations from which we can reroute the energies beneath the continent. These survey sites will be home to a new facility, one of very few constructed terrestrially here on Auraxis.
The Octal provides the shooter the ability to maintain a measure of their field of view without sacrificing their effectiveness at longer range.
A Vanu Sovereignty anti-personnel Proximity Mine that detonates upon detecting nearby enemy movement.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 29 rounds.
The Recon Detection Device shoots a pulsing dart that detects moving enemies nearby.
Authorization privileges granted by your faction leader.

A Nanite based Medical Applicator tool that has been specialized to repair and revive infantry soldiers.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.

This terrorist organization is called the <font color="#79A5FF">New Conglomerate</font>. This band of mercenaries attempted a violent insurrection that has escalated into the war that rages on. Treason, torture, and murder are just some of the many crimes they have committed and we shall bring them to justice.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> But first we need to get our bearings and gain an understanding of our surroundings. For we are not alone. And the peace will not last.

Killing an enemy has a 15% chance to give you and squadmates within 25 meters 20% increased frontal armor for 3.5 seconds. Does not stack with Safeguard. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> In order to resolve Esamir's condition, or at least prevent it from getting worse, we must construct a large facility capable of safely dispersing the flow of energy beneath the planet's surface. Think of it as a massive circuit breaker.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rounds.
You've got this! Don't let up!
You must first join a platoon.
Within its ornate triangular housing, the V3 Holo uses a red dot sight and 3.4x magnification for mid-range combat scenarios.
The NC6 Gauss SAW's low production cost, reliability, and sheer stopping power lead to wide-spread adoption of the weapon in the Auraxian War's early years. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. We've got a lot of hard work ahead of us and not nearly enough time to get it all done. But with the esteemed backing of the Nanite Systems Operatives, I'm sure we'll only be a few days late getting to Oshur.
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.

Allows the Infiltrator to use EMP grenades. EMP Grenades create a blast that can go through walls and destroy most enemy deployables. Soldiers directly caught in the blast will also have their personal shields and HUD disabled for a few seconds.

Reduces fall damage, allowing you to survive falls from heights twice as high than you normally would.

Killing an enemy has a 12% chance to give you and squadmates within 25 meters 20% increased frontal armor for 3.5 seconds. Does not stack with Safeguard. MAXes can equip and trigger this implant, but cannot receive the buff it offers.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Walking beneath Oshur's waves is slower than catching a ride, but it is far more difficult to detect than a regular old land, air, or sea attack.
Increases the weapon's reload speed by 13%.
The Reaver is the New Conglomerate's one-man fighter. With its afterburner enabled it becomes the fastest empire specific fighter in the skies.
A squad was removed from the platoon.
Apply the Delta camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.

For centuries, the militaristic TR kept the peace, and their conventional weaponry reflects this tradition. Unconcerned with collateral damage, they favor higher fire rates and larger magazine capacities to resolve situations quickly. The TR main battle tank, the <font color="#FF574B">Prowler</font>, is armed with a double barrel 120mm cannon with unmatched damage output. From the handheld <font color="#FF574B">Mini-Chaingun</font>, to the vehicle-mounted <font color="#FF574B">30mm Vulcan</font>, the TR employ chainguns of various sizes. The sound of these weapons spinning up strikes fear into the hearts of many. The handheld <font color="#FF574B">Striker</font> is a versatile 6 round rocket launcher with proximity-based auto-tracking.
Apply the single use California Scrub camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Able to make rapid follow-up shots on air and ground vehicles
